personalInfo.title: AI/ML Engineer & Software Developer
personalInfo.description: Passionate about transforming innovative ideas into real-world tech solutions. Specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Full-Stack Development.

about.intro: An innovative AI/ML and Software Engineer with a deep passion for transforming complex problems into intelligent solutions. I specialize in building machine learning models, developing scalable applications, and creating user-centric experiences that make a real impact.

education.degree: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

projects.title: Smart Study Timetable Generator
projects.description: An intelligent ML model that generates personalized study schedules using Random Forest Regressor, optimizing study time based on individual learning patterns and preferences. Features adaptive scheduling and performance tracking.

projects.title: E-Commerce Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for analyzing e-commerce data with real-time visualizations, customer behavior insights, and sales forecasting using advanced data science techniques.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive and modern portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring dark mode, smooth animations, and a clean design that showcases my work effectively.

services.title: Machine Learning Solutions
services.description: Custom ML models and AI solutions tailored to your business needs. From data preprocessing to model deployment.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Full-stack web applications with modern technologies. Responsive, fast, and user-friendly interfaces.

services.title: Data Science Consulting
services.description: Transform your data into actionable insights. Statistical analysis, visualization, and business intelligence.

services.title: AI Chatbot Development
services.description: Intelligent conversational AI solutions for customer service, support, and engagement. Powered by advanced NLP and machine learning.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android. From concept to App Store deployment.
features: App Store and Play Store deployment

services.title: Cloud Solutions & DevOps
services.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure and deployment solutions. AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud expertise.

services.title: Computer Vision Solutions
